QuestData.Title: Rescue the Chronicler
QuestData.Description:
Just ahead, Chronicler Jabari is being held in a cage, waiting to become a sacrifice.
One by one, I see dem taken away, I hear de screams. Blood drained to feed blood magic, and what was left... was food for a beast.
He is de only one left, and I don't have de strength to save him yet.
Get Jabari out of dere, so we can return to Princess Talanji.
